description.ar: الغسل، التطيب، لبس الإحرام، وصلاة ركعتين.
description.en: Perform Ghusl (ritual bath), apply perfume (to body, not clothes), wear Ihram garments, and pray 2 Rak'ahs.

translation.ar: اللهم إني أريد العمرة فيسرها لي وتقبلها مني
translation.en: Labbayka Allahumma Umrah (O Allah, here I am to perform Umrah)

duas.arabic: لَبَّيْكَ ٱللَّهُمَّ لَبَّيْكَ، لَبَّيْكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ لَبَّيْكَ، إِنَّ ٱلْحَمْدَ وَٱلنِّعْمَةَ لَكَ وَٱلْمُلْكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ

translation.en: Here I am, O Allah, here I am. Here I am, You have no partner, here I am. Verily all praise and blessings are Yours, and all sovereignty, You have no partner.

description.ar: دخول المسجد بالرجل اليمنى وقول دعاء الدخول.
description.en: Enter with your right foot and recite the supplication for entering the mosque.

duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ، وَالصَّلَاةُ وَالسَّلَّامُ عَلَى رَسُولِ اللهِ، اللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ

translation.en: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me.

description.ar: ابدأ من الحجر الأسود. 7 أشواط حول الكعبة.
description.en: Start from the Black Stone. Circumambulate the Kaaba 7 times counter-clockwise.

duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ

translation.en: Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good and in the Hereafter [that which is] good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

description.en: Walk between Safa and Marwah 7 times. Start at Safa, end at Marwah.

duas.arabic: إِنَّ الصَّفَا وَالْمَرْوَةَ مِن شَعَائِرِ اللَّهِ...

translation.en: Indeed, as-Safa and al-Marwah are among the symbols of Allah...

description.ar: حلق الشعر (للرجال) أو تقصيره. النساء يقصرن قدر أنملة.
description.en: Shaving the head (recommended for men) or trimming. Women trim a fingertip's length.
Proceed to Mina and stay overnight. Pray Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha and Fajr.

description.ar: الوقوف بعرفة وهو ركن الحج الأعظم.
description.en: Stand at Arafah. This is the most important pillar of Hajj. Make abundant Dua.

duas.arabic: لا إله إلا الله وحده لا شريك له، له الملك وله الحمد، وهو على كل شيء قدير

translation.en: There is no god but Allah alone, with no partner or associate...

description.en: Stay overnight in Muzdalifah. Collect pebbles for Jamarat.

description.ar: رمي جمرة العقبة، الهدي، الحلق، طواف الإفاضة.
description.en: Stone Jamrat Al-Aqabah, Sacrifice animal, Shave/Trim, Tawaf Al-Ifadah.
Stone the three Jamarat each day. Stay in Mina.
Perform Tawaf Al-Wada' before leaving Makkah.
